item.description:
Please join us for our 4th BBQ rally of 2011 and group ride.

Schedule of events

BBQ 11a.m. - 2p.m.

Ride leaves at 2:30

We will return to the shop around 4:00-4:30. Many people choose to head off on their own way from our final destination, so you also may join others going your way.

We usually ride to Crescent Ridge Dairy in Sharon and nobody seems to tire of that. Please let us know if you'd rather do a different ride this time. We could come up with a couple of choices and take a vote. (Note the ride needs to be appropriate for 49cc's also).
item.name: Danny's Scooter Shop BBQ Rally & Group Ride
